snippet: Tatiana Decrescenzo thought her dream had come true when she immigrated to the United States. But illnesses and low-paying jobs have forced her to take comfort in small gifts.
abstract: Shorefront YM-YWHA of Brighton-Manhattan Beach, beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Zoryan Fedchishin buy electric scooter to transport him to doctor.
lead_paragraph: Tatiana Decrescenzo thought her dream had come true when she immigrated to the United States. But illnesses and low-paying jobs have forced her to take comfort in small gifts.

headline.print_headline: A Husband and Wife, Both Fighting Illness, Find Solace in Songs
headline.main: Her Dream Fading, a Russian Immigrant Finds Solace in Singing

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
